item.title: Pachelbel’s Canon (in D) Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele.
Chords used: D, A, Bm, F#m, G
A version of the song in the original key of D was requested...so here it is!
Tutorial Video in C (GCEA & DGBE): @MK0A
************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from @
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).
Want to make a donation towards this work? Visit @f
Are you a teacher using ukulele in the classroom? Check out my video based method...effective, easy, and inexpensive! @eo-ukulele-method/
Check out the "merch": @ukestuff
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Ukulaliens Ukulele Play Along Videos - 30,000 Subscribers Thank You And Kazoo Day
item.description:
Just a little Thank You for all the support as we have recently hit 30,000 subscibers!
Also, to celebrate international kazoo day we played a bit of one of our favourite songs - Delilah by Tom Jones. With kazoos!
Thanks for all the support, many more videos to come.................
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: http://www.youtube.com/c/UkuleleWales T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop

item.title: Darth Vader's Theme - Ukulele TAB playalong
item.description:
For educational use. This tutorial shows ukulele students how to play the melody of The Imperial March (from Star Wars), also known as Darth Vader's Theme, on the uke.
Optimized for GCEA ukulele.

item.title: Pachelbel’s Canon (in C) Chord Letter Name Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Created with chord letter names so any non-transposing instrument can play along..

item.title: Buttercup - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
Buttercup by Jack Stauber, with lyrics. Chords used: Gmaj7 & F sharp minor. For educational use. The chords for the intro and outro have been intentionally omitted to make it easier to play. The Gmaj7 could be replaced with a regular G chord. The F sharp minor chord is the same shape as a G7, just played on strings 2, 3, and 4.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Isn't She Lovely, She's My Mom - Boomwhacker and Handbell Play Along
item.description: For education use. With this video students can explore melody, harmony, vocals, boomwhackers, and handbells. Perfect for the weeks leading up to Mother's Day.

item.title: Elvis Presley (Twenty One Pilots) - Can't Help Falling In Love UKULELE TUTORIAL W/ LYRICS
item.description:
Hey! Check my awesome stuff for merch at https://www.redbubble.com/people/Ukeledu/shop
-
¡Hey! Échale un ojo a mis molones artículos de merchan en https://www.redbubble.com/es/people/Ukeledu/shop
________________________
STRUMMING PATTERN / RASGUEO:
Main Riff / Riff principal: D D UD U
D: Down / Hacia abajo U: Up / Hacia arriba x: Muted strigs (Down) / Cuerdas muteadas con la palma de la mano (hacia abajo)
________________________
Hey! If you liked this video, give me a like, subscribe and comment your doubts, suggestions or anything you want.
- ¡Hey! Si te ha gustado el vídeo, dame like, suscríbete y comenta tus dudas, sugerencias o lo que te apetezca.
